user.title: Muller Intuis Connect Setup
user.description:
Connect your Muller Intuitiv system using your Netatmo credentials.

You need to create an app on https://dev.netatmo.com to get your Client ID and Client Secret.

data_description.client_id: Client ID obtained from Netatmo developer portal
data_description.client_secret: Client Secret obtained from Netatmo developer portal
data_description.username: Email address used for the Muller Intuitiv mobile app
data_description.password: Password for your Muller Intuitiv account

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to Muller Intuitiv server. Check your internet connection.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid credentials. Check your Client ID, Client Secret, email and password.
error.unknown: Unknown error. Check the logs for more information.

abort.already_configured: This Muller Intuitiv account is already configured in Home Assistant.

init.title: Muller Intuis Connect Options
init.description: Configure options for your Muller Intuis integration.
